      • addToZipBundle

        public void addToZipBundle(ZipOutputStream zos)
                    throws IOException
        Adds contents to a zip archive of a bundle of all the server's pages. This is used by the "export to static HTML" feature.
        Parameters:
        zos - An output stream to add content to
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if writing to the output stream cannot be done
